official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for civil service retirement purposes service as an enrollee of the Civilian Conservation Corps, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Includes as creditable service, for purposes of civil service retirement, service as an enrollee of the Civilian Conservation Corps.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for civil service retirement purposes service as an enrollee of the Civilian Conservation Corps, and for other purposes.
